ygData.subject: New Char List
ygData.msgSnippet: The council has agreed on changing the character limit from 5 characters max, to 8 characters max. So, from now on, you can have up to 8 characters.

The council has agreed on changing the character limit from 5 
characters max, to 8 characters max. So, from now on, you can have 
up to 8 characters.
